name: Wi-Fü
description:
Staying at home with just your Mom at the peak of your prime is anything but tragic. Nothing brightens your day up more than a live stream from your favourite waifu, Wi-Fu chan~~! That is, if your wifi can be repaired. Play as an otaku who desperately needs some 2D company, or the robot that wants to destroy your destiny.

CREDITS

  • Programming by Angelo Barredo and Zach Dion
  • Art and Video by Jintii
  • Pixel Art by Snurlsss

HOW TO PLAY

Get to the other end, and avoid the bot!

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • WASD: Move
    • Space: Place block
  • Gamepad:
    • Left Stick: Move
    • Right Trigger: Place block

Item Legend:
